description.en-US: Set daily Monkeytype typing goals, and if you wish, get notified as you meet them. As a plus, enjoy the extension's ability to match Monkeytype's theme! This extension is not affiliated with Monkeytype.

developer_comments.en-US: On my 2017 MacBook Air, the extension's notifications do not always display as intended, and the recorded time typing is not always accurate. I believe this should be less of an issue, if at all, on more capable hardware. I do not have plans to add more features.

summary.en-US: A tool that helps users reach their daily typing goals on Monkeytype.
